TopicTitle: Brand New Download Crashes on Launch

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I just bought and downloaded KSP tonight. I have never played the game much less installed any mods. It will not launch. It crashes half way through the yellow load bar. I have an almost new computer that runs on Window 10 with Nvidia Geforce FTX.  Needless to say I'm really disappointed my new game won't play. Can anyone help me faster than customer support? I don't know where to start. My log_error and error.log shows: (sorry, I don't see how to attach them as a file). I also couldn't find an applicable solution upon searching the forums.

log_error
GfxDevice: creating device client; threaded=1
Direct3D:
    Version:  Direct3D 9.0c [lci_proxyumd32.dll 2.0.33207.0]
    Renderer: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M
    Vendor:   NVIDIA
    VRAM:     2018 MB (via DXGI)
    Caps:     Shader=30 DepthRT=1 NativeDepth=1 NativeShadow=1 DF16=0 INTZ=1 NULL=1 RESZ=0 SlowINTZ=0 ATOC=1
Begin MonoManager ReloadAssembly


[snip]

Edited February 23, 2018 by Vanamonde

Welcome to our forum, skorpio_ink.  

Unfortunately, I had to delete your error log. Files that large causing page loading errors. Please upload the file to a sharing site and use the link they provide in your posts here.

Here is a link to Dropbox with all the error files (I tried several times). Any help is appreciated.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/2hrbn8p4jip6r0d/AABzqm9p2iw8WPz9Lq6UBmjFa?dl=0
